name: ZooDao
shortDescription: A cross-community NFT gaming experience powered by DeFi yields.
description: ZooDAO simplifies the on-ramp for NFT owners to interact with DeFi tools, enabling NFT owners to generate yield from their digital assets in a gamified environment. ZooDAOâ€™s dApp enables universal NFT utility for eligible projects. Engagement in battles promotes cross-community interaction and competition, with communities rallying support to generate additional yield for NFT holders, and the voters who support them in battle.
